verb

  2. to go, to walk, step (movement/motion indicating starting point, direction, aim and purpose)
  3. to go away, walk away , step away
  4. to enter; to step in(side), walk in(side), step in(side) (+ inne (“in(side)”) (ine (“id”)); a room, house, building)
